thread.title: Chloe Ferry admits to FANCYING one of Jedward (she just doesn't know which twin)

author: Lara Martin
title: Chloe Ferry admits to FANCYING one of Jedward (she just doesn't know which twin)
text:
CBB housemates left in TEARS after Chloe's shock exit Share this video Watch Next 
Viewers were in shock after Chloe rubbed her naked bum against John in the bathroom. She had just stepped out of the shower wrapped in a pink towel, when she decided to back her nude rear end into John as he crouched down at the sink. 
“Ready for this?” she asked, before shaking her bottom. 
Popstar John seemed bemused by what she was doing, telling her: “Jesus, what are you doing? Oh God, I can’t even look at you right now. I just can’t. What are you doing to us?” 
“That’s what you call a real woman’s bum!” laughed Chloe. Chloe is the fifth housemate evicted from CBB (Photo: Channel 5) 
“Thank you so much,” said John, covering his eyes and refusing to stand up. “I feel blessed. I can’t look right now.” 
“Do you not want to see what real woman looks like?” asked Chloe. 
She later gave John a cheeky lapdance after donning a bikini during a wild night in the house. 
Chloe is the fifth housemate to be evicted from this series of CBB after being nominated alongside Kim Woodburn, Coleen Nolan and Jedward last night. 
* CBB continues 9pm on Channel 5. Read More
